name: Jim Morrissey Boyle
text: 2 person crew rocking fast pizza!  Tiana & Trevor ! A+

name: Matrix Defector
text: Fast service. Pizza is as good as any other Little Cesar's. No surprises, and I like that. …More

name: Jaime Renville
text: Excellent atmosphere. Very hard working, pleasant employees. Came in on a busy Sat. Nite & 1 oven wasn't working... 3 young men working very hard while smiling & greeting customers from way in the back as customers came in the door. Most fast food joints have HORRIBLE customer service. NOT THIS ONE!!!!! A++++++

name: Christine upkeep Cleaning services LLC
text: Hot and good

name: Maria Garcia
text: Pizza quality is fine. However the staff here is usually awful. My husband went in and payed for our food and mentioned a sign on the door that said “if we don’t offer crazy bread you can get it for free” well the black female at the …More

name: Katie T
text: I wish I would’ve caught the name of the manager working tonight. He totally made my day. I was tired, hungry, and had 2 anxious kids. His service was helpful, quick, and thoughtful. He even offered my kids little Cesar cookies :-) the …More

name: Margaret Packard
text:
THIS LOCATION IS PERMANENTLY CLOSED.
Just drove 10 miles from Cary (because ours closed too), only to find that it’s closed.  It would be nice if you would put an outgoing message on your phone so people stop driving all the way here.  I figured the employees were just busy on a Saturday night.

name: Catarina Pulliam
text: Hot-N-Ready but not so much. Every time we go in, it takes easily 15 minutes or more to get a cheese pizza. Last time, staff messed up our order and we came home with a pepperoni pizza instead of cheese. It'd be fine but we're vegetarian. I …More

name: Matthew Orlemanski
text: Why was this location closed?? :( Let me guess ... Amazon pizza with 2 day delivery is opening lol. Seriously... Little Caesars was the best and had really great staff!! I never had to wait long for my pizza. Plus the pizza was soooooooo good too, gotta get the crazy sauce to dunk the slices in YUM!

name: Todd Adams
text: Poor experience. Saturday, November 3rd around 6:20 pm, nothing was hot and ready. I waited 20 minutes. Guy behind the counter had zero communication skills and no eye contact. He actually walked away from me while I was ordering to go do …More

name: Cindy DuBois
text: I ordered online with the new app which I have used at another Little Caesar’s successfully. I ordered one pepperoni,one Hawaiian pizza and crazy bread. About 20 minutes after ordering I got a phone call advising me they didn’t have any …More

name: Cassandra Wladyslava
text: Everyone was very nice and helpful. However... I ordered the extramostbestest with stuffed crust. When I got home and opened it I saw that I had only gotten regular crust. Of course, this had to happen the one time I don't check.  I …More

name: Stephanie Wallis
text: I'm changing my review now that this location has their pizza portal up and going. Everything was great. I ordered from my app and picked up at the portal with no issues. The pizza was great, cooked correctly. I know most ppl don't love little Caesars, but you can't beat it for the price.

name: Diartlady
text: They were very nice and extended the time for the free lunch on Monday.  Thank you very much.  I was my first time trying their pizza! I enjoyed it! Great job!

name: Miguel Lozada
text: Fast ready pizza is probably their best marketing/delivery idea.

name: Charles Gragg
text: Hot n ready© was not ready. Otherwise excellent.

name: Robert Drda
text: Short wait, friendly workers, really nice place

name: Michael Frechette
text: Decent Little Caesar's pickup place.  The gentlemen working the place was busy but friendly.

name: Glenn Harris
text: I walked into this Little Caesar's on a Saturday.  I said, "I'd like a Lunch Special, please." They said they don't offer them on weekends.  I thought that was a painfully stupid business decision on their part, but said, "ok, well can I …More

name: Win Aguila
text: When i want simple cheap pizza this is my go to place especially for Deep Dish. Today after a horrible debate with my bank the gentleman Tyquan help me out and made it a better night at least with the food good man for sure.

name: Matt Fischl
text: Very fast and reasonably priced pizza.

name: Bielka01
text: Really inexpensive pizza that tasted better than the expensive ones. Just stay away from the crazy bread.

name: Jeremy Cawley
text: I've never had a bad pizza here.

text: Great pizza but usually very budy

name: Matthew Hogan
text: Says Hot and Ready but the last 3 times I was there the 1 pepperoni and 1 bread stick I ordered I had to wait 20 mins. I can get that anywhere.

text: Friendly staff & good food.

name: John Draper
text: "hot and ready" are never hot and ready.  Just call it "made to order" like it always is.

name: Rob Morris
text: Love the new thin crust EMB

name: Regina Stewart
text: The pizza has gotten soooo much better here. For $5 and no waiting you really can't beat it.

name: Nathan Coppley
text: Perfectly adequate pizza.  Commensurate to the price but nothing to write home about.

name: Gary Martin
text: Ordered mostest, mostest pizza,  Got the regular pizza with 5 extra slices of pepperoni.  Disappointed.

name: Nic B
text: Pizza has been under cooked lately. They rush when they are busy and never seem prepared for a rush.
